items.name: Item: WordShuffle
items.instructions: Put the words in the correct order to form a sentence.
sentences: I do not have [much] money.|私はあまりお金を持っていません。|many lot
There are [many] apples in the box.|箱の中にたくさんのリンゴがあります。|much lot
I have a [lot] of time to study this weekend.|今週末は勉強する時間がたくさんあります。|much many.
I have a [lot] of friends.|私はたくさんお友達がいる。| much many
She has [many] pencils.|彼女はたくさん鉛筆をもっている。| much lot
There is [much] milk in the fridge.|冷蔵庫に牛乳はいっぱいあります。|many lot

items.name: Item: Typing GapFill
items.instructions: Fill in the missing words or letters
sentences: I do not have [much] money.|私はあまりお金を持っていません。|many lot

items.name: Item: Free Writing (1)
items.instructions: Type your answer to the question in the text area below.
items.text:
Write one original example sentence that contains following word(s):
{ai data1}
items.freewritingaidata2:
I do not have much money.
There is much milk in the fridge.

items.name: Item: Free Writing (2)
items.instructions: Type your answer to the question in the text area below.
items.text:

{ai data1}
items.freewritingaidata2:
I have a lot of time to study this weekend.
I have a lot of friends.
